name: Blockie
description:
Knock the flying blocks down!!

Blockie is a really fun game appropriate for all ages and very easy to learn.

It is so perfect to play a quick game or to spend a long time trying to improve your score or to complete the achievements of the Game Center.

- -

App developed by:

· José María López Torres
· Andy Hernández Salazar
· Concha Alonso Valdivieso
